home.title: ToolHub.tools
home.subtitle: A collection of tools to make your daily life more convenient
home.description: From calculators to pomodoro timers, discover various web tools that enhance productivity and convenience in your daily life. Quick and easy to use on all devices.
home.weeklyUpdates: New tools are added every week
home.aboutIntro: Web tools for daily life and work, all in one place!
home.aboutSubtitle: ToolHub.tools is a collection of free utility tools that can be used directly in your browser without installation.
home.feedbackMessage: We look forward to your feedback for better service.
home.aboutDescription: ToolHub.tools is a collection of web-based utility tools that anyone can use easily and quickly. We provide various functions useful for daily life and work, such as calculators, timers, number raffles, and YouTube thumbnail downloaders, all in one website. Our goal is to enhance user productivity and convenience through free tools that can be used directly in the browser without installation or registration.
home.roadmap: Weekly Release Plan: Unit Converter → Password Generator → QR Code Generator → Weather Info
home.regularUpdates: More tools will be added through regular updates

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We enhance user productivity and convenience through free tools that can be used directly in the browser without installation or registration.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: All data is stored only in your browser and never transmitted to external servers, ensuring complete privacy protection.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We support Korean, English, and Japanese languages and provide optimized experiences across all mobile and desktop environments.

contact.description: If you have any inquiries or suggestions, please feel free to contact us anytime. We will continue to develop into a more convenient service by reflecting user feedback.

calculator.title: Calculator
calculator.description: A complete calculator supporting everything from basic arithmetic to advanced calculations. Provides keyboard shortcuts and calculation history features.

pomodoro.title: Pomodoro Timer
pomodoro.description: Maximize productivity with the Pomodoro technique of 25 minutes focus + 5 minutes break. Provides task management and progress visualization features.

timer.title: Universal Timer
timer.description: A countdown timer that allows you to freely set any desired time. Use it for various purposes like cooking, exercise, rest, etc.

raffle.title: Number Raffle
raffle.description: A tool for fair and fun number draws. Provides a visually enjoyable drawing experience with slot machine animations.

thumbnail.title: Thumbnail Downloader
thumbnail.description: Easily download high-quality thumbnail images from YouTube videos. Provides various resolution options.

unitConverter.title: Unit Converter
unitConverter.description: Convert various units including length, weight, temperature, and volume quickly and accurately. Provides real-time calculations and conversion history.

passwordGenerator.title: Password Generator
passwordGenerator.description: Automatically generate secure and strong passwords. Create customized passwords with various options.

dateCalculator.title: Date Calculator
dateCalculator.description: Calculate the exact difference between two dates and view results in years, months, days, hours, and more.

section1.title: Personal Information Collection and Use
section1.content: Toolhub.tools collects minimal personal information for service provision. We collect anonymized usage statistics through Google Analytics when using the website, which is used solely for service improvement.

section2.title: Information We Collect
section2.item1: Website visit statistics (page views, visit duration, etc.)
section2.item3: Device information (browser type, operating system, etc.)
section2.item4: User settings stored in local storage (calculator history, timer settings, etc.)

section3.title: Purpose of Information Use
section3.content: Collected information is used only for the following purposes:
section3.item1: Service quality improvement and feature enhancement
section3.item3: Statistical analysis for user experience improvement

section4.title: Information Security
section4.content: All data is securely protected, and we do not collect personally identifiable information. User calculator history, timer settings, etc. are stored only in browser local storage and are not transmitted externally.

section5.title: Cookie Usage
section5.content: This website uses cookies for Google Analytics service provision. You can block cookies in your browser settings, but some functions may be limited.

section6.title: Third-Party Services
section6.content: We do not share user information with third parties except for Google Analytics. Google's privacy policy applies separately.

section7.title: Contact
section7.content: If you have any questions about personal information processing, please contact us through the contact page.

section1.title: Service Introduction
section1.content: Toolhub.tools is a service that provides various web tools such as calculators, timers, and number raffles for free. These terms regulate basic matters regarding service use.

section2.title: Service Use
section2.item1: All tools are provided free of charge and can be used without registration
section2.item2: The service is accessible through web browsers
section2.item3: User data is stored only in the local browser
section2.item4: Users must comply with relevant laws when using the service

section3.title: Service Scope
section3.content: Toolhub.tools provides the service as-is and does not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of the service. Users must use the service at their own responsibility.

section4.title: User Responsibility
section4.content: Users must use the service only for lawful and appropriate purposes and must not engage in acts that harm other users or third parties.

section5.title: Service Changes and Discontinuation
section5.content: The service provider may change or discontinue the service content as needed, with prior notice as a principle, except in urgent cases.

section6.title: Disclaimer
section6.content: Users are responsible for all consequences arising from service use, and the service provider bears no responsibility except as specified by relevant laws.

section7.title: Terms Changes
section7.content: These terms may be changed as needed, and the revised terms take effect upon posting on the website.

cookies.title: Cookie Usage Notice
cookies.message: This website uses Google Analytics cookies for service improvement.

introduction.title: Smart Calculator
introduction.description: ToolHub.tools' smart calculator is an online tool that can quickly and accurately handle all mathematical calculations needed in daily life and work. It supports everything from basic arithmetic to complex mathematical functions, with an intuitive interface and keyboard shortcuts that anyone can easily use. It automatically saves calculation history for quick reuse of previous results and provides the same user experience across all devices.

features.title: Key Features
features.basicOperationsDesc: Arithmetic operations, percentages, square roots, etc.
features.advancedFunctionsDesc: Memory functions, calculation history, keyboard support
features.accessibilityDesc: Keyboard navigation, voice support, high contrast mode

guide.title: Detailed Usage Guide
guide.basicCalcDesc: Click number buttons or type directly on the keyboard to create calculations, then press the = button or Enter key to see results. Operator precedence is automatically applied for accurate complex formula calculations.
guide.memoryDesc: Store current results in memory with the M+ button, and recall stored values with the MR button. Clear memory with the MC button to efficiently manage intermediate results in complex calculations.
guide.historyDesc: All calculations are automatically recorded and can be viewed in the calculation history panel on the right. Click previous calculation results to load that value as current input, and use the clear history button to delete all records.

examples.title: Usage Examples
examples.dailyDesc: Useful for common calculation situations like shopping budget calculations, discount rate calculations, tip calculations, cooking recipe ratio calculations, and household accounting.
examples.workDesc: Can be used in work situations requiring accurate calculations such as creating quotes, sales calculations, tax calculations, project budget management, and profitability analysis.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.accuracy: Q. Are the calculation results accurate?
faq.accuracyAnswer: A. Yes, we use JavaScript's high-precision mathematical operations to provide accurate calculation results. However, for very large numbers or extremely precise decimal calculations, minor errors may occur due to the nature of floating-point arithmetic.
faq.shortcutsAnswer: A. Yes, all major keyboard inputs are supported including number keys, operator keys (+, -, *, /), Enter key (=), Escape key (C), and Backspace key.
faq.mobile: Q. Does it work well on mobile?
faq.mobileAnswer: A. Yes, with responsive design it works conveniently on smartphones and tablets. It's optimized for touch interfaces, enabling accurate input in mobile environments.

tips.title: Usage Tips and Tricks
tips.efficiencyTips: Use keyboard shortcuts, save intermediate values with memory functions, reuse calculation history, quick sharing with copy function
tips.accuracyTips: Use parentheses for complex formulas, check decimal places, verify important calculations, ensure unit consistency

introduction.title: Accurate Unit Converter
introduction.description: ToolHub.tools' unit converter is an online tool that quickly and accurately converts various measurement units such as length, weight, temperature, and volume. It supports all unit conversions needed in daily life and professional work including scientific calculations, cooking, travel, and learning. With an intuitive interface and real-time conversion features, anyone can easily use it, and conversion history is saved for quick re-checking of frequently used conversions.

features.title: Key Features
features.categoriesDesc: Length: mm, cm, m, km, inch, feet, yard / Weight: g, kg, oz, lb, ton / Temperature: Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin / Volume: ml, L, cup, gallon, pint
features.convenienceDesc: Real-time automatic conversion, bidirectional conversion support, conversion history storage, accurate decimal calculations

guide.title: Detailed Usage Guide
guide.basicDesc: Select the desired category tab (length, weight, temperature, volume) and enter the value to convert. Select the 'from' and 'to' units from the dropdown menus and the result will be calculated automatically. Conversion results update in real-time whenever you modify the input value.
guide.bidirectionalDesc: Click the arrow button in the middle to swap the 'from' and 'to' units. This feature allows easy reverse conversion, for example converting from meters to feet and then back from feet to meters.
guide.historyDesc: All conversion results are automatically recorded and displayed in the conversion history section at the bottom. Click previous conversion results to load that value as current input, and use the 'clear history' button to delete all records.

examples.title: Usage Examples
examples.dailyDesc: Useful for common unit conversion situations like recipe unit conversions while cooking, understanding local units while traveling abroad, managing exercise records, and checking product sizes when online shopping.
examples.professionalDesc: Can be used in professional work environments requiring accurate unit conversions such as architectural design, engineering calculations, scientific experiments, manufacturing quality control, and unit standardization in international trade.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.accuracy: Q. Are the conversion results accurate?
faq.accuracyAnswer: A. Yes, we use international standard conversion factors to ensure high accuracy. For temperature conversions, precise formulas are applied, and decimal calculations are handled with precision.
faq.moreUnits: Q. Will more units be added?
faq.moreUnitsAnswer: A. We plan to continuously add new units and categories based on user requests. Currently, we prioritize supporting the most commonly used units.
faq.decimal: Q. Can decimal places be adjusted?
faq.decimalAnswer: A. Currently, up to 6 decimal places are displayed and automatically rounded as needed. For scientific precision requirements, calculations are performed with full precision.
faq.compound: Q. Are compound unit conversions possible?
faq.compoundAnswer: A. Currently we support basic unit conversions, and compound units (e.g., m/s, kg/m³) will be added in future updates.

tips.title: Usage Tips and Tricks
tips.efficiencyTips: Bookmark frequently used conversions, use bidirectional conversion button, reuse conversion history, quick sharing with copy function
tips.accuracyTips: Check input value ranges, verify unit symbols accurately, pay attention to absolute temperature in temperature conversions, recommend verification for important calculations
